state_analysis: The ISO image '/tmp/tcc.iso' has been successfully created and is 646KB in size. This indicates that it contains the tcc binary and is ready to be used with QEMU.
explanation: Now that the ISO file has been created, we will run the QEMU command to boot the custom Linux kernel with the tcc ISO attached to the CD-ROM. This will allow us to use tcc from within the QEMU virtual machine.
